posts.content:
1966 LHD 13 window Deluxe Spec walkthrough Microbus £22,500
German Built April 1966 & exported to USA
Imported Jan 2008 to UK by myself
Birth Certificate from VW
Lowered all round
Dropped spindles from Type 2 Detectives
Adjustable spring plates from Transporterhaus
IRS conversion with 1303 gearbox and early bay drums
1600 TP engine with alternator and 12V electrics
Rebuilt steering column with Boatyard guard fitted
Dual circuit brake upgrade
Original L87 Pearl White top & repainted L512 Velvet green bottom
Interior upholstery by Custom, Classic & Retro Interiors
Original cab floor mat and walkthrough mats
Bumper overriders all round and front towel rail
Full width rock ’n roll Bluebird Customs bed
Full deluxe body trim, chrome badge, jail bars, fuel gauge, deluxe clock & radio, chrome ashtray, ivory steering wheel, 6X opening pop out windows etc
DAB/CD/iPod and iPhone compatible stereo
BRM replica wide 5 wheels
Fabrik interiors Bus Eyes & Just Kampers cover included
Inertia seatbelts all round
Fully under sealed March 2016
Regularly serviced by Bughaus Nottingham
Used daily, genuine reason for sale £22,500
Tax free and sold with 12 months MOT

Contact Neil 07966 391 904
Will be at Busfest, come have a look!

Thanks

Will consider part ex for early beetle '58-63

Neil
